scripts.ig_init: cp -r data/ig-data/alvearie-template build/ && cd build && yes | bash ./_updatePublisher.sh && bash ./_genonce.sh
scripts.ig: cp -r data/ig-data/alvearie-template build/ && cd build && sh ./_genonce.sh -tx
scripts.build_snapshot: mkdirp src/main/resources/com/ibm/fhir/cdm && tar -C src/main/resources/com/ibm/fhir/cdm/ -xf build/output/package.tgz && mvn clean install
scripts.copy_snapshot: mkdirp target/site && cp target/*.jar build/output && cp target/*.jar target/site
scripts.copy_snapshot_win: mkdirp target\site  && copy target\*.jar build\output && copy target\*.jar target\site
scripts.all: npm run sushi && npm run ig_init && npm run build_snapshot && npm run copy_snapshot && npm run zip_snapshot && npm run copy_version
scripts.all_win_cmd: npm run sushi && npm run ig_init_win && npm run build_snapshot && npm run copy_snapshot_win && npm run zip_snapshot_win && npm run copy_version_win
scripts.all_win_bash: npm run sushi && npm run ig_init && npm run build_snapshot && npm run copy_snapshot_win && npm run zip_snapshot_win && npm run copy_version_win
